categories: Category:Battles of the Cold War (Galactic Republic–Sith Empire)

nodes.text: During the Cold War, a battle betweeen between the forces of the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire occurred above the planet of Saleucami. The skirmish was the result of the interception of a Imperial infiltration squadron by a Republic starfighters squadron. The Republics were led by the notorious ace Pilot Nezhel “Sunspot” Othren who lost his life during the battle. The skirmish was resolved when Imperial members of the Empire's Fury squadron came to aid the squadron and destroyed the Republic attackers.

The battle above Saleucami appears as Saleucami Fleet Action, one of the Space Missions available in the MMO Star Wars: The Old Republic. Imperial players are called in to destroy a minimum of five Red Talon fighters and the single BT-7 Thunderclap. It is the Imperial counterpart of the Javaal Fleet Action.
